description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class and various tools in the 'deepinfra' model, including tests for synchronous and asynchronous tool usage, streaming responses, multiple tool calls, and custom tool functions.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the YFinanceTools to fetch current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool calls for the same stock price query.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response for multiple stock symbols.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools (YFinanceTools and DuckDuckGoTools) in one response.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function without parameters (skipped in actual test).

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes multiple URLs for paper summaries.
